properties.description: Posted by FlutaholicFormer location of the University of Ottawa\'s music department.

properties.name: 170 Lees Avenue
properties.description: Posted by FlutaholicI lived here for a couple of years - bit of a dump and had a lot of immigrants living here.

properties.name: All Flutes Plus
properties.description: Posted by FlutaholicAnother flute shop in London. Staff aren\'t quite as friendly as they used to be years ago.

properties.name: Andrew Haydon Park
properties.description: Posted by Flutaholic I played many a concert in this park in all sorts of weather - hot, cold, extremely windy...I lost Colonel Bogey many years ago to a brisk wind!

properties.name: Chappells of Bond Street - new location
properties.description: Posted by FlutaholicSpectacular selection of music of all sorts here. It\'s so much better and has tons more space than the old shop on Bond Street which was in the basement.

properties.name: Confederation High School
properties.description: Posted by Flutaholic

properties.name: Family Records Centre
properties.description: Posted by Flutaholic Great reference sources for genealogists. Has all censuses and birth, marriage and death indexes here - as large books! You need strong shoulders to heave these down!

properties.name: Herb & Spice
properties.description: Posted by FlutaholicAnother health food/speciality food shop I worked at years ago!

properties.description: Posted by Flutaholic I worked in the health food shop here for a few years.

properties.name: Nepean Sportsplex - built 1971/2
properties.description: Posted by FlutaholicWonderful sports facility to grow up near - Olympic size pool, 2 rinks, squash courts, curling rinks.

properties.name: Planet Organic - Torrington Street
properties.description: Posted by FlutaholicExcellent selection of organic food and teas at this health food shop.

properties.name: Rehearsal location for Nepean Concert Band
properties.description: Posted by Flutaholic I spent a lot of time here - getting there early for band practices.

properties.name: Topwind
properties.description: Posted by FlutaholicFlute shop in London - only sells flutes and piccolos and music related to these instruments. Great staff here!

properties.name: Where I lived before I moved to England
properties.description: Posted by FlutaholicGreat south view from this apartment. I used to cycle from here to Billings Bridge along the bike paths which cut the distance down amazingly!
